    About Us

    SciamLab is a Software Engineering Company specialized in business process automation and integration focused on data consultancy and smart cities solutions.

    SciamLab created Amaca an innovative Content Discovery and Enrichment platform used by our enterprise customer to navigate and exploit the vast amount of public data available on the internet.
